summary: This is an email from August 19, 2019, forwarding subpoena returns related to the Epstein case, including toll records and other information. It instructs the recipient not to worry about 4chan records or IP-related subpoenas, indicating an active investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the forwarded email, providing subpoena returns and instructions regarding the investigation.

events.title: Subpoena Returns Provided
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends subpoena returns, including toll records and officer information, to a recipient, with instructions to disregard 4chan and IP-related subpoenas.

keyFacts: Subpoena returns were received and forwarded in August 2019 as part of the Epstein investigation.
The returns included toll records and officer information, as indicated by attached files.
The email instructs the recipient to ignore subpoenas related to 4chan records and IP information, suggesting those were not a priority or relevant to the core investigation.
